Question
========

In a study of study success, the following variables are used: expected grade (at the beginning of the course, $X_{1}$), commitment to the trade ($X_{2}$) and grade on the trade (Y). It turns out that $X_{1}$ has an effect on $X_{2}$ and that both $X_{1}$ as $X_{2}$ has an effect on Y . What multivariate relationship is involved here? 
Answerlist
----------
* Interaction
* Mediation
* Multiple causes
* Direct and indirect effects

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
